title: Joker
overview: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

title: Heat
overview: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

title: Crash
overview: Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

title: Eskiya
overview: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

title: Blood Simple
overview: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

title: Boksuneun naui geot
overview: A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

title: Sleepers
overview: After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

title: Nightcrawler
overview: When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

title: Lola rennt
overview: After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

title: Road to Perdition
overview: A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

title: Training Day
overview: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

title: Drishyam
overview: A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

title: Special Chabbis
overview: A gang of con-men rob prominent rich businessmen and politicians by posing as C.B.I and income tax officers.

title: Du rififi chez les hommes
overview: Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

title: Reservoir Dogs
overview: When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

title: Funny Games
overview: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

title: The Untouchables
overview: During the era of Prohibition in the United States, Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop ruthless Chicago gangster Al Capone and, because of rampant corruption, assembles a small, hand-picked team to help him.
stars: ['Kevin Costner', 'Sean Connery', 'Robert De Niro', 'Charles Martin Smith']

title: The Departed
overview: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: No Country for Old Men
overview: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
